mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lc_info VALUES ( (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(a.lcIdx)=0 THEN 0 ELSE COUNT(a.lcIdx) END FROM lc_info a), #{year}, #{lc}, null, null, null, null )
mapper.select: SELECT year, LC, fgMemberId1, fgMemberId2, fgMemberId3, fgMemberId4 FROM lc_info
SELECT year, lc, fgMemberId1, fgMemberId2, fgMemberId3, fgMemberId4 FROM lc_info WHERE year=${year} ORDER BY year, lc
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM lc_info WHERE year=#{year} AND lc=#{lc}
mapper.select:
SELECT lcIdx as `key`, year, lc, (SELECT fgMemberName FROM fg_member_info WHERE fgMemberId=fgMemberId1) as fgMemberName1, (SELECT fgMemberName FROM fg_member_info WHERE fgMemberId=fgMemberId2) as fgMemberName2, (SELECT fgMemberName FROM fg_member_info WHERE fgMemberId=fgMemberId3) as fgMemberName3, (SELECT fgMemberName FROM fg_member_info WHERE fgMemberId=fgMemberId4) as fgMemberName4 FROM lc_info WHERE True
AND year LIKE '%${year}%'
AND lc LIKE '%${lc}%'
AND ( (SELECT fgMemberName from fg_member_info where fgMemberId=fgMemberId1) LIKE '%${fgMemberName1}%' OR (SELECT fgMemberName from fg_member_info where fgMemberId=fgMemberId2) LIKE '%${fgMemberName1}%' OR (SELECT fgMemberName from fg_member_info where fgMemberId=fgMemberId3) LIKE '%${fgMemberName1}%' OR (SELECT fgMemberName from fg_member_info where fgMemberId=fgMemberId4) LIKE '%${fgMemberName1}%' )
AND ( (SELECT fgMemberName from fg_member_info where fgMemberId=fgMemberId1) LIKE '%${fgMemberName2}%' OR (SELECT fgMemberName from fg_member_info where fgMemberId=fgMemberId2) LIKE '%${fgMemberName2}%' OR (SELECT fgMemberName from fg_member_info where fgMemberId=fgMemberId3) LIKE '%${fgMemberName2}%' OR (SELECT fgMemberName from fg_member_info where fgMemberId=fgMemberId4) LIKE '%${fgMemberName2}%' )
